example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM رئيس) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجمهورية))) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يقول) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-2 (PRON_3MS ه)) (VP (PRT (FUT_PART س)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يوفد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC وزراء)) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تسليم) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الدعوات))) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الرؤساء) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN العرب))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: to hand the invitations to the Arab leaders
